text:
I have created a module that has a color field.
I am using the module in a template and would like to set the color for this field to something other than the default color.
When I attempt to pass the color through along with other variables, it erases the entire CSS value.
Can anyone help me better understand what is happening?
Screenshots attached show output window.
I believe you need to pass the color value through as an object. {color: Val , opacity: Val}
Thanks, that worked! But it is interesting as I have another module that I have just passed the hex code through and it works.
Hmmmmm Is that also a color field or a text field?
